Posts.Content: Hi everyone, just had my first mammo after finishing radiotherapy in june 2017, i also had 2 surgerys Wle and 6 fec-t chemo, just wondering are many women called back after the 1st mammo after bc due to changes from treatment....I am terrified as i suffer from chronic anxiety disorder...many thanks                   ps: I was diagnosed with tnbc in august 2016
Posts.Title: 1st mammogram after Wle, chemo and radiotherapy
